  abstract: |
    The following workflow provides a starter script for deriving deforestation risk maps in accordance with Verra's new methodology for unplanned deforestation allocation in jurisdictional nested REDD+ projects using the [VT0007 toolset](https://verra.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/VT0007-Unplanned-Deforestation-Allocation-v1.0.pdf).
